Aimersoft DVD Studio Pack description
All-in-one DVD Ripper, Video Converter, Audio Converter and DVD Creator

Aimersoft DVD Studio Pack is an all-in-one multimedia software that includes Aimersoft Video Converter, DVD Creator and Audio Converter and Aimersoft DVD Ripper.

Aimersoft DVD Studio Pack supports all common video and audio formats (MP4, AVI, MPG, MPEG, VOB, WMV, ASF, FLV, WMA, M4A, MP3, AC3, WAV, etc.) and all common media players (iPod, Zune, iPhone, Apple TV, PSP, Xbox 360, PS3, Archos, iRiver, Creative Zen 

, Pocket PC, PDA, Mobile Phone, etc). 

You can also crop, trim and adjust the effect of movie, and you can burn your favorite movie to DVD video slideshows with fascinating transitions and resources to create a DVD menu of your own.

Here are some key features of "Aimersoft DVD Studio Pack":

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Support all common video and audio formats: MP4, AVI, MPG, MPEG, VOB, WMV, DivX, XviD, MOV, DAT, VOB, IFO, 3GP, 3GPP, ASF, FLV, WMA, M4A, MP3, WMA, AC3, WAV, limewire and YouTube, Google video, etc.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Support all common media players: iPod, Zune, iPhone, Apple TV, PSP, Xbox 360, PS3, Archos, iRiver, Creative Zen, PMP, Pocket PC, PDA, etc.

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Support DVD 5 and DVD 9; DVD-R, DVD+R, DVD-RW, DVD+RW, DVD+R DL, DVD-R DL, DVD-RAM supported.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Support burning ISO file.
